summary: yes .. chicken explodes and send you flying if too close!. i also added nuclear spell if you want NPC flying ..
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod for a bored adventurer , this will bring a little fun .. i guess :))
BEWARE the chickens dont run ..

to learn spell , on console type : 
\\\\\\\"help nuclear\\\\\\\"
shits and stuffs will appear , type in :
\\\\\\\"player.addspell <SPELL ID>\\\\\\\"

there are two spells ..
nuclearFAR wont harm you, only the NPC ..
nuclearSelf will blast your souls out and everyone..
author: rhenLalabsyuu
